p:
We had hoped that the development of an assay to quantitate plasma inhibitory activity would provide insight into response or toxicity, but unlike the experience of plasma inhibitory activity in the setting of an FLT3 inhibitor,
19, 20 consistent correlations were not found. In a phase 2 study of patients with relapsed AML treated with clofarabine and temsirolomus, correlation of response to dephosphorylation of pS6RP (S6 ribosomal protein) was demonstrated.
21 However the target cells were the patients' own blasts, which were not available in the current study and it was unclear whether the clinical outcome was superior to that which clofarabine alone could achieve.
